instructions: place the dinner fork on the left bottom corner of the table cloth
place the dinner knife on the right bottom corner of the table cloth
place the salad fork to the immediate left of the dinner fork
place the salad knife to the immediate right of the dinner knife
place the soup spoon immediately right of the salad knife
place the dessert spoon at the top center of the table cloth, with its bowl facing towards the left
move the dessert spoon to the immediate right of the soup spoon and oriented vertically
move the dessert spoon to the top center of the table cloth, with its bowl pointed to the left
place the dinner plate in the center of the table cloth
place the bread plate above the salad fork and to the left of the dessert spoon
put the butter knife on the bread plate with its blade pointed 45 degrees to the lower left
place the wine glass directly above the soup spoon on the table cloth
place the water glass to the right of the dessert spoon and the left of the wine glass
place the napkin on top of the dinner plate
